OTP_LENGTH: Otp code must be 6 characters long
PASSWORDS_MISMATCH: Password and confirm password do not match
PASSWORD_MIN_LENGTH: Password Min Length 8 at least characters.
EN_ALPHABET_ONLY: English {FIELD_NAME} must contain English letters only.
AR_ALPHABET_ONLY: Arabic {FIELD_NAME} must contain Arabic letters only.
EN_LENGTH: English {FIELD_NAME} must be between 2 and 100 characters long
AR_LENGTH: Arabic {FIELD_NAME} must be between 2 and 100 characters long
NAME_IS_STRING: The name must be a string.
NAME_MIN_LENGTH: The name must be at least 2 characters long.
NAME_MAX_LENGTH: The name must not exceed 100 characters.
DESCRIPTION_IS_STRING: The description must be a string.
DESCRIPTION_MIN_LENGTH: The description must be at least 2 characters long.
DESCRIPTION_MAX_LENGTH: The description must not exceed 150 characters.
ACTIVE_IS_BOOLEAN: Active status must be a boolean
IS_AVAILABLE_IS_BOOLEAN: The availability status must be a boolean value.
IMAGE_IS_STRING: Image URL must be a string.
IMAGE_IS_URL: Image URL must be a valid URL.
WEBSITE_IS_STRING: Website URL must be a string.
WEBSITE_IS_URL: Website URL must be a valid URL.
IS_PHONE_NUMBER: Phone number must be a valid phone number

coupon.CODE_IS_STRING: Coupon code must be a string.
coupon.CODE_MIN_LENGTH: Coupon code must be at least 3 characters long.
coupon.CODE_MAX_LENGTH: Coupon code must be at most 50 characters long.
coupon.EXPIRATION_DATE_IS_DATE: Expiration date must be a valid date.
coupon.EXPIRATION_DATE_IS_IN_FUTURE: Expiration date must be in the future.
coupon.MIN_ORDER_TOTAL_IS_NUMBER: Minimum order total must be a number.
coupon.MAX_DISCOUNT_IS_NUMBER: Maximum discount amount must be a number.

CATEGORY_IS_STRING: The category must be a string.
CATEGORY_MIN_LENGTH: The category must be at least 1 character long.
CATEGORY_MAX_LENGTH: The category must not exceed 50 characters.
QUANTITY_IS_STRING: The quantity must be a string.
QUANTITY_MIN_LENGTH: The quantity must be at least 1 character long.
QUANTITY_MAX_LENGTH: The quantity must not exceed 50 characters.
KEY_MIN_LENGTH: Key must be at least 2 characters long
MIN__LENGTH_VALUE: {FIELD_NAME} must be at least {constraints.0} characters long
LENGTH: {FIELD_NAME} must be between {constraints.0} and {constraints.1} characters long
PRICE_AFTER_DISCOUNT_LESS_THAN_PRICE: {FIELD_NAME} must be less than the original price
INVALID_COMPARISON: The value of {FIRST_FIELD_NAME} must be $t(common.OPERATORS.{OPERATOR}) the value of {SECOND_FIELD_NAME}
PAYMENT_METHOD_TYPE: Payment method type must be 'cash' or 'card'
INVALID_EGYPTIAN_PHONE_NUMBER: Phone number is not valid, use valid egyptian phone number
INVALID_SAUDI_PHONE_NUMBER: Phone number is not valid, use valid saudi phone number
DATE_RANGE: The date range is invalid. {START} must be before {END}.
